name: Cloak of Veiled Shadows
tooltip:
Cloak of Veiled ShadowsLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Martial Drape, 2 Azure Idols, 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Ivory Scarabs to Keyl Swiftclaw in Silithus.  You must also obtain Revered reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Martial Drape
- Azure Idol x 2
- Bronze Scarab x 5
- Ivory Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
